subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chicago Bears running back Cedric Benson was subdued with pepper spray and dragged ashore by officers in Austin, Tex., after he was arrested for failing a sobriety test while operating a 30-foot boat.
snippet: Chicago Bears running back Cedric Benson was subdued with pepper spray and dragged ashore by officers in Austin, Tex., after he was arrested for failing a sobriety test while operating a 30-foot boat.
